    • getGameReviews

      @GetMapping("/user/game-reviews") public String getGameReviews(@RequestParam("gameId") Long gameId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      returns all reviews on a game by a given game id
      Parameters:
      gameId - - unique key for the gameRepository
      model - - inserting attributes to the page
      Returns:
      game's reviews if exists, error page else

    • getReviewForm

      @GetMapping("/user/addreview") public String getReviewForm(@RequestParam("gameId") Long gameId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Returns a review form if game exists
      Parameters:
      gameId - game's id
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      error page if inputs are invalid, addReview page with the game's attribs else

    • showReviewAddedPage

      @GetMapping("/user/review-added") public String showReviewAddedPage()
      Returns:
      Review added successfully page

    • postReview

      @PostMapping("/user/addreview") public String postReview(@Valid @Valid Review review, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, @RequestParam("gameId") Long gameId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Method to add a new review based on given gameId and a given review object
      Parameters:
      review - A review object
      result - result from validating the review
      gameId - an optional entry for gameRepo
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      Success page on success, error page if review/game id is invalid

    • getUserReviews

      @GetMapping("/user/all") public String getUserReviews(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      method to return all users reviews
      Parameters:
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      All reviews added by the authenticated user (by his username)

    • editReview

      @GetMapping("/user/edit/{id}") public String editReview(@PathVariable("id") Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get method to return an edit review page
      Parameters:
      id - - potential entry for game repo
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      editreview page with a review object or null as "review" attrib

    • editReview

      @PostMapping("/user/edit") public String editReview(@Valid @Valid Review review, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A post method for editing an existing review
      Parameters:
      review - - review obj
      result - result from validating the review's field
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      error message on failure or all of the user's reviews

    • deleteReview

      @PostMapping("/user/delete/{id}") public String deleteReview(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A post method for deleting a user's review by a given review id
      Parameters:
      id - potential entry in review repo
      model - to add attributes
      Returns:
      error page if entry not found, all users reviews if successfully deleted

    • getReviewsControlPanel

      @GetMapping("/admin/management") public String getReviewsControlPanel(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Returns a special admin page with all reviews allows him to take action on those reviews
      Parameters:
      model - to add all reviews
      Returns:
      manage reviews page for the admin which contains all reviews in the review repo

    • deleteReview

      @PostMapping("/admin/delete") public String deleteReview(@RequestParam("reviewId") Long reviewId)
      Post method to delete a review by a given review id
      Parameters:
      reviewId - potential key
      Returns:
      management page in both cases of existing and non-existing key
